# AttributeScopes.FoundationAttributes.AlternateDescriptionAttribute

**Enumeration**

A type for using an alternative description as an attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum AlternateDescriptionAttribute
```

## Using alternative description attributes

- **alternateDescription**: A property for accessing an alternative presentation attribute.

## Conforms To

- AttributedStringKey
- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- DecodableAttributedStringKey
- EncodableAttributedStringKey
